text.section: The Director shall maintain a list of confidential intermediaries.
To qualify to be a confidential intermediary, an applicant shall meet the requirements of subsection (d) of this section.
If the applicant is a child placement agency, the agency shall appoint an employee of the agency as the representative member to make the application on behalf of the agency.

section.section:
If the applicant is an individual, the applicant shall:
have completed at least 8 hours of training, approved by the Director, in providing search, contact, and reunion services; and
meet any other qualifications that the Director establishes for confidential intermediaries.

If the applicant is a child placement agency, each employee who will provide search, contact, and reunion services under this subtitle shall:
have completed at least 8 hours of training, approved by the Director, in providing search, contact, and reunion services; and
meet any other qualifications that the Director establishes for confidential intermediaries.
The Director may establish a reasonable fee for an application under this section.
The overall amount of fees collected may not exceed the costs of processing the applications.
